abilities.name: Dancer
abilities.description: New set of moves is randomly selected each turn when overwritten by another opponent's Mega Evolved Pok√©mon. Ownership still depends on who got the set of moves on the dance floor first.

abilities.name: Inferno
abilities.description: The opponent is inflicted with the burning status condition with 1/3 max HP damage and a 50% chance to burn and KO each turn.
